name: Sophia Nguyen
preferences_in_transportation: cycles frequently, drives when transporting baked goods
lifestyle: early riser for baking, yoga practitioner

original_plans.reflection: Last week was fairly routine, with a mix of work at the Coffee shop, morning yoga sessions at the Gym, and spending time with my husband Daniel. I cycled frequently for short trips and drove when transporting baked goods. This week, I’m looking forward to meeting my friend Isabella at the Museum for an art exhibition during lunch. I also plan to maintain my usual routine of early morning baking and yoga. Additionally, I should consider grocery shopping soon as our household supplies are running low. Traffic around midday seems manageable, but I’ll need to keep an eye on congestion near the Museum during peak visiting hours.
plan: Wake up at home, complete morning routine including yoga.
Drive to Coffee shop to start baking for the day.
Meet Isabella Rodriguez at the Museum for an art exhibition at noon.
Return to Coffee shop to continue working after the exhibition.
Stop by the Supermarket to pick up groceries before heading home.
Drive back home to relax and spend time with Daniel.
concepts: The Museum area may get crowded during the art exhibition.
Traffic near the Museum might increase due to visitors.
Supermarket tends to be less busy in the early evening.
Ave_3_link_2 has moderate delays in the late afternoon.
